name: ConditionalColorScaleCriterion
description: Represents a Color Scale Criterion which contains a type, value and a color.

properties.name: type
properties.description: What the icon conditional formula should be based on.

properties.name: formula
properties.description: A number, a formula, or null (if Type is LowestValue).

properties.name: color
properties.description: HTML color code representation of the color scale color. E.g. #FF0000 represents Red.
